pt.piloto: TRÁFEGO Guarulhos, bom dia, {{callsign}}, na posição {{gate}}, solicita plano de voo instrumentos para {{arrival}} no nível {{cruise}}, ciente da informação {{atis}}, pronto para cópia.
pt.atc: {{callsign}}, autorizado IFR para {{arrival}} no nível {{cruise}}, decola da pista {{runway}}, transição via {{sid}}, código transponder {{transponder}}, coteje.

pt.piloto: Autorizado IFR para {{arrival}}, nível {{cruise}}, decola da {{runway}}, transição {{sid}}, código transponder {{transponder}}, {{callsign}}.
pt.atc: {{callsign}}, cotejamento correto. Para pushback e acionamento, coordene com a UNICOM 122.800. Bom voo!

en.piloto: Guarulhos Delivery, good morning, {{callsign}}, at stand {{gate}}, requesting IFR clearance to {{arrival}}, FL{{cruise}}, with {{atis}}, ready to copy.
en.atc: {{callsign}}, cleared to {{arrival}}, climb FL{{cruise}}, departure runway {{runway}}, via SID {{sid}}, squawk {{transponder}}. Read back.

en.piloto: Cleared to {{arrival}}, FL{{cruise}}, via SID {{sid}}, runway {{runway}}, squawk {{transponder}}, {{callsign}}.
en.atc: {{callsign}}, readback correct. Contact UNICOM 122.800 for pushback and startup. Have a good flight!

pt.atc: {{callsign}}, autorizado pushback e acionamento, reporte pronto para taxi.

en.atc: {{callsign}}, pushback and start-up approved. Report ready for taxi.

pt.atc: {{callsign}}, taxi via {{taxi_out}} até o ponto de espera da {{runway}}.

en.atc: {{callsign}}, taxi via {{taxi_out}} to holding point runway {{runway}}.

pt.piloto: {{callsign}}, pronto no ponto de espera da {{runway}}.
pt.atc: {{callsign}}, autorizado decolagem pista {{runway}}, vento calmo, ajuste 1016.

en.atc: {{callsign}}, cleared for takeoff runway {{runway}}, wind calm, QNH 1016.

pt.piloto: {{callsign}}, decolado, subindo para FL190 via SID {{sid}}.
pt.atc: {{callsign}}, radar contato, reporte ao atingir FL190.
Autorizado subida para FL{{cruise}}, reporte no ideal de descida.

en.piloto: {{callsign}}, airborne, climbing to FL190 via SID {{sid}}.

en.atc: Climb and maintain FL{{cruise}}, report at top of descent.

pt.atc: {{callsign}}, boa tarde, continue descida para FL060.

en.atc: {{callsign}}, good afternoon, descend and maintain FL060.
Cleared for ILS approach runway 02, report established.

pt.piloto: {{callsign}}, na final da pista 02, trem baixado e travado.
pt.atc: Autorizado pouso pista 02, ajuste 1008, reporte livrando.

en.piloto: {{callsign}}, final runway 02, gear down and locked.
en.atc: Cleared to land runway 02, QNH 1008, report runway vacated.

pt.atc: {{callsign}}, prossiga o taxi via posição {{gate}}, mantenha na escuta da TWR até o corte dos motores.
pt.piloto: Vai prosseguir com o taxi via posição {{gate}}, vai manter na escuta da torre até o corte dos motores o {{callsign}}.
{{callsign}}, informa corte dos motores na posição {{gate}}.
pt.atc: Ciente {{callsign}}, coordene agora na frequência livre 122.800. Até a próxima!

en.atc: {{callsign}}, taxi to stand {{gate}}, remain with tower until engine shutdown.
en.piloto: Taxiing to stand {{gate}}, staying with tower until shutdown, {{callsign}}.

en.atc: Contact UNICOM 122.800. See you next time!
